summary: Energetic Construction Manager with cross-disciplinary experience in pipelines, gas and oil facilities, and mining industry regulations. Known for strong leadership, effective communication, problem solving, and building solid relationships with owners and engineers. Safety-focused with a track record of delivering projects on time and on budget across multiple sites.

experience.title: Construction Manager
experience.description: Managed the construction of API tanks and facilities along with the pipeline from the port to the facility, including drilling beneath railways and coastal areas. Erected 12 tanks at Port Hudson, Scenic, Port Allen; oversaw port-to-tank pipeline work.

experience.title: Construction Manager
experience.description: Shutdown project management; installed solar turbine and boiler to produce electricity; oversaw civil, structural, and mechanical works for a large shutdown-and-upgrade program at Kennecott.

experience.title: Construction Manager
experience.description: Construction manager of the 85 API tanks project and the associated structural and civil work.

experience.title: Construction Manager
experience.description: Managed the building of six pump stations; Denham mine project; upgraded pipelines and associated mechanical systems, silos, shakers, and conveyor belts.

experience.title: Project Manager / Construction Manager
experience.description: Managed setup and logistics for overseas projects: 6 tanks and facility pipeline and pump stations; 17-mile pipeline in New Mexico into the existing facility with new API tanks; projects in Wyoming (Douglas, Pronghorn facility) involving new tanks and facility pipeline, meter skids, pump stations, and rail work.
